name: Giuseppe
description:
Giuseppe, the magic watchmaker mouse, is immigrating to America from Italy aboard the SS Prinzess Irene. Use his time-traveling abilities to navigate through the ship, rewind time and stop the ship from crashing into an iceberg!

Giuseppe is a 2.5D platformer using arrow keys to move and Z to grab, X to rewind time, and C to rewind yourself.

Game made in ~4 weeks as part of Spring 2023 Game Design, Prototyping, and Production.

Credits:

Jean Cho - Art

Will Ozeas - Programming, Sound Design & Music

Efe Cekirge - Programming

Kalen Gressing - Level/Environment Design

Joanne Tsai - UI art & implementation

Phoebe Wu - Production
